name: Alolan Grimer
description: The Sludge Pokémon. Brought to Alola to solve the garbage problem, Grimer seems to relish any and all kinds of trash.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: On melee attacks made by this Pokémon, roll a d10 on a hit. On a result of a 10, the target is poisoned.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Power of Alchemy
abilities.description: When switched in after an ally faints, this Pokémon copies the non-hidden ability of the fainted ally until switched out.
